item.description: SUMMARYDeadpool #1, set to release on April 3, 2024, will offer fans another wild and action-packed adventure. InHyuk Lee’s variant cover for the debut issue intensifies anticipation, showcasing Deadpool effortlessly slicing through grenades and bullets. The all-star creative team, including writer Cody Ziglar and artist Rogê Antônio, guarantees an epic and beloved series that stays true to Deadpool’s enduring appeal. Literature ReviewMarvel’s favorite, foul-mouthed mercenary, Deadpool, is back with a brand-new solo comic run featuring a must-have InHyuk Lee foil variant cover!

item.title: Deadpool s Healing Factor is The Opposite of Wolverine s, Not The Same
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDeadpool and Wolverine have similar powers, but their healing factors work differently. Deadpool’s healing factor was designed specifically for him and does not heal injuries, but rapidly creates cells being killed by his cancer. Wolverine’s healing factor constantly heals his body to its original form, but he cannot grow back lost limbs like Deadpool can. Literature ReviewDeadpool and Wolverine seem as though they have the same exact healing factors, but the two abilities are opposites and perfectly suited for each!

item.title: Deadpool s New Era Gives His Mutant Daughter the Spotlight She Deserves
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDeadpool’s upcoming solo title relaunch will feature his mutant daughter Ellie Camacho in a starring role, adding a new dynamic to the series. Ellie’s introduction into the Deadpool mythos has humanized Wade and motivated him to act as an antihero to protect her future. There is a possibility that the Ellie appearing in the upcoming series could be her future self from Marvel 2099, bringing an intriguing twist to the storyline.

item.title: Deadpool s Son Has an Even Better Healing Factor (But Wolverine Still Destroyed Him)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWolverine’s biggest strength is his willingness to endure pain and keep moving forward. Despite not being the fastest, strongest, or most intelligent, Wolverine always survives and stands tall. Healing factors alone aren’t enough; Wolverine’s ability to embrace and use pain gives him the upper hand. Literature ReviewAs he faces off with Deadpool’s son, Wolverine reveals his secret to survival, and why a stronger healing factor isn’t enough to beat him.

item.title: Death Strikes The Emperor of Atlantis Preview (Exclusive)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDeath Strikes: The Emperor of Atlantis is a graphic novel adaptation of a powerful opera written by two prisoners in a concentration camp. The creative team behind the graphic novel incorporates the original artwork and background information about the creators and the opera’s creation. By adapting this nearly lost masterpiece, the graphic novel aims to challenge the tyrants of today and introduce this fierce satire to new audiences. Literature ReviewScreen Rant has an exclusive preview of Dark Horse Comics newest original graphic novel, inspired by an opera from two concentration camp prisoners.

item.title: Deku s Signature My Hero Academia Attack Confirms He s Stronger Than All Might
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDeku’s mastery over One for All allows him to use the Delaware Smash technique without damaging himself like before, showcasing his growth and improvement. By combining the Delaware Smash with the Third’s Fa Jin Quirk, Deku creates a massive wave of pressure that can stop Shigaraki’s destructive Decay, demonstrating his incredible level of power. Despite the possibility of parting ways with One for All, Deku is proving himself to be a worthy heir to All Might, operating at a level of strength that rivals the Symbol of Peace himself.

item.title: Demon Slayer The Different Colors of Nichirin Swords Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNichirin swords in Demon Slayer come in different colors that represent the wielder’s Breathing Style, with black blades being associated with the Sun Breathing technique. Some characters have specialized styles that have unique colors, such as Shinobu’s light purple sword, representantive of her Insect Breathing, which is a subset of Water Breathing. Nichirin swords can have patterns or markings that contribute to their color-changing ability, and some characters wield weapons other than katanas, like Mitsuri’s pink whip-like blade or Genya’s shotgun that fires Nichirin shells.

item.title: Discowing Returns Nightwing s Beloved Original Costume Shines in Official DC Art
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNightwing’s iconic Discowing suit makes a dazzling return in a variant cover, igniting hope for its appearance in the current narrative. The design pays a faithful homage, retaining the vibrant blues, shimmering gold, signature plunging neckline, and glittery sequins that defined the original suit. ​ The Discowing suit makes its return in Nightwing #113 / Legacy #300. Literature ReviewNightwing’s iconic and fan-favorite Discowing suit makes its sequin and obscenely-low-neckline return in Dick Grayson’s landmark 300th issue.

item.title: Disney Chose Its 100th Anniversary to Officially Confirm a Dark Lion King Fan Theory Is 100% True
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY2023 was Disney’s 100th Anniversary, and the House of Mouse verified a dark fan theory. Disney has confirmed that the hyenas in The Lion King survived by eating each other, with Whoopi Goldberg’s Shenzi called out as a cannibal. It’s an incredibly dark reveal, but it explains how an army of hyenas survived despite being banned from the Pride Lands. Literature Review2023 was Disney’s 100th anniversary, and while it wasn’t a great year for new movies, Lion King fans did get a wild fan theory confirmed.

item.title: Disneys Hercules Is Getting A Comic Book Sequel From Dynamite Comics
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDisney fans can look forward to a sequel comic for Hercules, following the success of previous Disney-inspired comics by Dynamite Comics. (90 characters) The new Hercules comic will feature the creative team of Elliott Kalan and George Kambadais, known for their work on Spider-Man, Gargoyles, and The Daily Show. (93 characters) The comic will combine elements of the myth of Pygmalion with a mystery involving Aphrodite, giving readers a fresh take on the Disney hero and the opportunity to explore more of Olympus’ gods and goddesses.

item.title: Doctor Doom is a Better X-Men Leader than Professor X Ever Was
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYX-Men #29 shows Doctor Doom successfully leading his team of new team of mutants, with the complex Marvel villain immediately improving on ways Professor Xavier faltered the X-Men. Doctor Doom’s mutants have found a home in Latveria, succeeding where Xavier’s Krakoa failed. Doctor Doom’s approach to nurturing his mutants is characterized by offering love, care, and a space to hone their abilities, showcasing his complicated nature, even as one of Marvel’s most enduring villains.

item.title: Doctor Doom Only Has 1 Actual Superpower, But It Makes Him Scarier Than Thanos
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDoctor Doom sees himself as a hero, seeking to end suffering and bring humanity under his rule for their own good. Removing his guilt allows Doctor Doom to tap into his full power and become an unstoppable force. Doom’s quest for power ultimately overcomes his desire to eliminate Reed Richards, showing that he has come to the realization that his worst enemy not Mister Fantastic, but in fact, himself.

item.title: Doctor Strange Confirms Why Marvel s Illuminati Must Remain a Secret
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Illuminati, a powerful group in the Marvel Universe, have returned to combat the threat of Thanos and must keep their existence a secret. The Illuminati, including Doctor Strange, Emma Frost, Iron Man, and the Blue Marvel, are strong when they work together and outclass the Avengers. The ethical dilemmas surrounding the Illuminati’s power and decision-making have led them to hide their existence and operate in secrecy. Literature ReviewThe Illuminati are one of Marvel’s most powerful organizations, and now Doctor Strange has confirmed why their existence must be kept secret.

item.title: Doctor Strange Explains the True Meaning of His Codename (That Lets Him Beat Stronger Sorcerers)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDoctor Strange explains the true meaning of his codename, which allows him to defeat stronger sorcerers like General Strange. General Strange is a formidable foe, but he has forgotten the qualities of a doctor, such as empathy and compassion, that Doctor Strange possesses. Doctor Strange’s compassion and empathy have made him one of Marvel’s greatest heroes and enable him to defeat powerful sorcerers lacking these traits. Literature ReviewIn a preview for Doctor Strange #10, the Doctor explains the hidden meaning of his codename, and how it lets him defeat stronger opponets.

item.title: Doctor Strange s Biggest Weakness is Obvious, But Makes Perfect Sense
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDoctor Strange can be easily defeated by simply preventing him from speaking, as demonstrated in Thanos #2. Thanos effectively neutralizes Doctor Strange by strangling him with his own cape, taking advantage of the sorcerer’s inability to cast spells without speaking. This new weakness adds to Doctor Strange’s growing list of vulnerabilities, making it easier for his enemies to defeat him. Literature ReviewDoctor Strange has a select few weaknesses, most of which aren’t easy to exploit.

item.title: Doctor Strange s Creepiest Power is Straight Out of Chucky
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDoctor Strange reveals his creepy new magic trick: communicating through dolls, much like Chucky from the horror franchise. Strange gifts dolls (Captain America’s word, Strange refers to them as “figurines”) to his allies, which he can astral projects his consciousness into, allowing him to be a consultant even when not physically present. This weird new ability proves to be incredibly useful for Doctor Strange, as he can be in multiple places at once, and support heroes from a distance, even while fighting his own battles.

item.title: Doctor Strange s New Secret Defenders Roster Revealed in God-Tier Alex Ross Art
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDoctor Strange forms a new Secret Defenders team to stop a sentient role-playing game taking over NYC. The Secret Defenders have been seen before in the 1970s and 1990s, but this is a modern revival. The new team includes Doctor Strange, Black Cat, Taskmaster, and Hunter’s Moon, but their conflicting personalities may threaten their success. Literature ReviewIn a first look at Alex Ross’ cover to Doctor Strange #13, the Sorcerer Supreme has brought together a new incarnation of the Secret Defenders.

item.title: Doctor Voodoo Fanart Is a Movie Quality Take on Doctor Strange s Successor
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDoctor Voodoo’s fan art by BossLogic showcases the character’s menacing transformation and traditional uniform, hinting at his potential inclusion in the MCU. Doctor Voodoo, originally known as Brother Voodoo, is a powerful magic user who briefly held the title of Sorcerer Supreme after Doctor Strange. The inclusion of Doctor Voodoo in a future Doctor Strange movie would not only bolster his profile but also shake up Doctor Strange’s world and provide an opportunity for him to regain his title.

item.title: Doctor Who Comic Writer Who Inspired New Episode Got No Comics Royalties
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWriter Pat Mills did not receive royalties for his Doctor Who comic strip, even after a reissue by the publisher Panini. Mills speaks highly of the BBC, Bad Wolf, and the production crew, but criticizes the comic book publisher for not paying royalties. This situation reflects a larger issue within the comic book industry, where writers often face disrespect and lack of payment for their work. Literature ReviewThe new episode of Doctor Who is inspired by a comic book which unfortunately did not offer the creator any royalties.

item.title: Don t Tell Batman Each Robin Keeps a Major Secret - & It s Hilarious
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFormer and current Robins share a hilarious secret: they have all had run-ins with Bat-Mite on Christmas, with each one keeping it a secret from their successor, leaving it as a surprise. Damian Wayne, the latest Robin, experiences his own personal torment at the hands of Bat-Mite, but his fellow Robins pretend they have no idea what he’s talking about. Every Robin needs a Bat-Mite encounter as a rite of passage into the Bat-Family, even though they keep it a secret from each other.

item.title: Donatello s Daughter Just Became One of TMNT s Most Powerful Turtles Ever
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTeenage Mutant Ninja Turtles #147 introduces Donatello’s daughter, Lita, as the most powerful member of the team. Lita, a Timestress, has the ability to bend time and space, making her reach god-like and her loyalty solely to her TMNT family. Lita’s inclusion in the team elevates their strength to a level previously unimaginable, surpassing other new recruits in power. Literature ReviewDonatello has a daughter in Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, and she’s growing up to be the strongest new member of the TMNT in the franchise’s history.

item.title: Dragon Ball All The Super Saiyan Levels Ranked Weakest To Strongest
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThere have been many different transformations used in Dragon Ball over the years, from Super Saiyan to Ultra Instinct. The differences between some of these transformations are subtle, and many are only used by one or two characters. New transformations are often being introduced in the Dragon Ball Super manga, so there are likely many more forms that lie ahead for Goku and friends. Literature ReviewTwenty years ago, the Super Saiyan form was the cream of the crop.

item.title: Dragon Ball Fans Get First Look At What DAIMA Will Look Like In The Manga
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDragon Ball DAIMA will feature Goku and Vegeta as kids, and a recent illustration by Toyotarou gives fans a glimpse of their new look in the manga. The upcoming anime is set to debut in Fall 2024 and may eventually have a manga adaptation, following the franchise’s trend of crossing over media platforms. Some fans misunderstood the illustration as a hint of an upcoming Dragon Ball Super adaptation of DAIMA’s story, causing controversy, but it was simply a homage and not a preview of the next arc.

item.title: Dragon Ball Fans Should Thank GT For Making Super More Interesting
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDragon Ball GT utilized the sequel tropes set up by DBZ, making it a necessary predecessor to Dragon Ball Super’s unique qualities. Dragon Ball Super deviated from the narrative trajectory of DBZ, exploring new transformations and introducing a multiverse concept. Dragon Ball Super’s uniqueness is a direct result of GT’s existence, as it forced the series to embrace new ideas and unpredictable transformations. Literature ReviewDragon Ball GT’s existence paved the way for Dragon Ball Super to be the series that fans know and love today, & it’s all because of 1 key factor.

item.title: Dragon Ball Finally Delivers the Goku VS Bardock Fight Fans Demand
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDragon Ball Super attempted to tease a Goku and Bardock interaction but ultimately fell short, while Dragon Ball Heroes steps in to give readers the Goku and Bardock moment they’ve been waiting for. In Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Ultra God Mission, Goku and Bardock finally fight each other, with Bardock surprisingly proving to be more powerful than ever before. Despite the potential for a deeply emotional moment between father and son, Dragon Ball Heroes takes a more casual approach, resulting in a lackluster and unoriginal scene.

item.title: Dragon Ball Gets The Modern Redesign It Needed From Jujutsu Kaisen s Author
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYJujutsu Kaisen creator Gege Akutami put his own spin on the iconic Dragon Ball manga cover for volume #41, as part of the Dragon Ball Super Gallery Project. Akutami’s cover, depicting Buu laughing at Piccolo, was featured on the back cover of the November 2023 issue of Saikyo Jump. The Dragon Ball Super Gallery project involves different mangaka redesigning the covers of the series’ tankoban volumes each month, with Akutami being the 28th artist to participate.

item.title: Dragon Ball s Beerus Has a Secret Weakness That Proves How Goku & Vegeta Could Kill Him
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGoku could have killed Beerus in the Buu arc by almost murdering the Supreme Kai, as their lives are linked. Gods of Destruction can be wiped out, as seen in the Future Trunks arc, but Beerus and the Supreme Kai are still alive in the main timeline. Beerus’s weakness is known by only a few, but it’s only a matter of time before someone changes the power dynamic in Dragon Ball Super.

item.title: Dragon Ball s Biggest Retcon Made Beerus Canon All the Way Back in Z
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDragon Ball Super’s Beerus was mentioned in Dragon Ball Z, hinting at his existence years before his official introduction. The connection between Beerus and the Elder Kai’s imprisonment was a clever retcon that linked the two series together. While Beerus is stronger than Buu, the chaotic nature of Buu made him more dangerous, according to Elder Kai’s comment. Literature ReviewAkira Toriyama revealed that one obscure line in Dragon Ball Z actually referred to Beerus, retroactively connecting the two series.

item.title: Dragon Ball s Namek Arc Gets Fan Poster So Good it Could Be Official Art
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY@DBSKAKERU1’s fanart of Gohan, Krillin, and Bulma on their journey to Namek captures the excitement and wonder of the iconic Namek Saga. The poster hints at the upcoming story with a Dragon Ball logo and the arrival of Vegeta or the Ginyu Force. @DBSKAKERU1 impresses with their ability to create Dragon Ball artwork that rivals the official art, deserving recognition for their skills and talent. Literature ReviewThe Namek Saga is an iconic arc in Dragon Ball lore, and in a new fan-made poster, Gohan, Krillin, and Bulma set off on their epic journey planetside!

item.title: Dragon Ball s Official Timeline Teases That GT Is Actually Canon
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDragon Ball GT is considered canon, according to an official timeline released by Shueisha. The timeline includes events from Dragon Ball, Dragon Ball Z, Dragon Ball Super, and Dragon Ball GT. Akira Toriyama, the creator of Dragon Ball, considers GT to be a minor part of the overall story and was involved in its production. Literature ReviewShueisha created an official timeline for the Dragon Ball franchise, and it includes the events from Dragon Ball GT, making it canon.

item.title: Dragon Ball s Strongest Version of Yamcha Actually Beat Vegeta
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA spin-off manga gives Yamcha an opportunity to shine by exploring different choices he could have made in the Dragon Ball Z storyline. Yamcha trains extensively and unlocks his potential in order to defeat the Saibamen and even defeats Vegeta with some help. Despite changing the course of events, Yamcha’s actions do not have a major impact on the overall Dragon Ball Z story. Literature ReviewThe epic Dragon Ball Z battles in the Saiyan Saga go a lot differently in a spin-off manga where Yamcha gains enough power & knowledge to beat Vegeta.

item.title: Dragon Ball s Ultra Instinct Has One Incredible Advantage Most Fans Ignore
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYUltra Instinct in Dragon Ball has the power to stop psychic opponents in their tracks, as demonstrated by Goku against Hearts. Hearts, a villain with mind-reading abilities, is unable to anticipate Goku’s movements when he is in the Ultra Instinct state. Ultra Instinct allows Goku to act and move without conscious intervention, making it impossible for psychics like Hearts to read his mind and predict his actions. Literature ReviewGoku proved Ultra Instinct’s greatest rarely seen advantage when battling against the psychic character Hearts in Super Dragon Ball Heroes.

item.title: Dragon Ball Super 100 Teases Black Frieza s Shocking Real Power Level
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAccording to the latest issue of V Jump, Black Frieza’s power level approaches that of a God of Destruction, which explains how he was able to humiliate Goku and Vegeta. Frieza achieved his newfound power by actually training for the first time in his life, using a Room of Spirit and Time. It is uncertain if Black Frieza is now the strongest person in the universe, but he is definitely closer to a God of Destruction than Goku and Vegeta.

item.title: Dragon Ball Super Confirms Gohan is Back as a Main Character With a Subtle Detail
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGohan’s excellent command over his Beast Form confirms that he will return as a major character in Dragon Ball Super. Having once again surpassed Goku and Vegeta, the half-Saiyan is motivated by his desire to protect loved ones rather than a passion for battle. Gohan’s newfound power and control over his emotions make him a key player in defending Earth against future threats, including Black Frieza. Literature ReviewSince he can easily shift into Beast Mode, the story has every reason to keep the powerful half-Saiyan in the spotlight.

item.title: Dragon Ball Super Confirms How Super Hero Changed Goku & Vegeta s Relationship Forever
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYVegeta’s recent victory over Goku in a sparring match could be a major turning point in their relationship and has upset the delicate balance between them. Goku’s admission of being outmatched by Vegeta shows that he is just as annoyed at coming in second as Vegeta always has been, proving that they’re more similar than they appear. This new dynamic between Goku and Vegeta could reignite their rivalry, motivate them to up their game, and push them to reach new levels of power, especially with the threat of Black Frieza still looming.

item.title: Dragon Ball Super Confirms That The Super Hero Arc Is Not Over Yet
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Super Hero arc of Dragon Ball Super manga is not over yet, as revealed in chapter #100. Fans hoping for the start of a new arc in chapter #100 will be disappointed, as the focus will probably go back to Goten and Trunks. The added scene in chapter #100 sets up Carmine’s revenge plot, indicating more original content to come. Literature ReviewChapter #100 of Dragon Ball Super surprisingly shows that the Super Hero arc is not over yet, despite fan criticism for this adaptation of the movie.

item.title: Dragon Ball Super Finally Gave Krillin the Revenge Against Cell He Always Deserved
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYKrillin finally gets revenge on Cell by successfully using Solar Flare against Cell Max. Krillin’s Solar Flare technique incapacitates Cell Max and allows Gamma 2 to sever his arm. Krillin’s experience highlights Cell Max’s flaw and the missed opportunity for a sweeter revenge. Literature ReviewKrillin gets the chance to redeem himself for his earlier failures with Cell in DBZ by using a particular move against Cell Max in Dragon Ball Super.

item.title: Dragon Ball Super Finally Makes Krillin And 18 The Best Fighter Couple
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDragon Ball Super showcases Krillin and Android 18 as the best fighter couple in the franchise, with their battle against Cell Max highlighting their unique dynamics. The manga adaptation of the Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero film adds many moments that paint a great picture of Krillin and 18’s relationship, breaking gender stereotypes in the process. Krillin saving 18 and 18 later finishing what Krillin started in the battle against Cell Max challenge gender-biased stereotypes and highlight the strength of their partnership.

item.title: Dragon Ball Super Finally Reveals Why Beerus Is Training Goku And Vegeta
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBeerus has been training Goku and Vegeta to potentially become the next God of Destruction of Universe 7. Goku’s disinterest in the job hasn’t stopped Beerus from trying to find a replacement, and Vegeta could also be a candidate. Beerus has been the God of Destruction for a very long time, and he likely wants to retire. Literature ReviewWhile Dragon Ball Super’s Destroyer God, Beerus, seemed hungry for a good fight, his secret reason for training Goku and Vegeta has come to light.

item.title: Dragon Ball Super Officially Adds Broly To Its Main Cast With Huge Implications
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBroly’s character development in Dragon Ball Super takes a significant turn as it is revealed that he can potentially learn to control his rage. This marks a major shift in Broly’s role, as he may no longer be limited to serving as a last resort in battle and could become a mainstay in future fights. Broly’s journey to control his rage will be documented, providing a refreshing perspective in the Dragon Ball series and avoiding the fate of other sidelined Z-Fighters.

item.title: Dragon Ball Super Proved Why it s Z s True Successor Over GT With One Fight
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDragon Ball Super’s fight with Jiren proves it is the true successor to Dragon Ball Z, breaking the formula of the series and honoring its legacy at the same time. Unlike Dragon Ball GT, Super allowed the series to evolve and veer away from repetition and predictability. The battle with Jiren showcased genuine character growth and the significance of previous conflicts, making Super a more significant continuation of Dragon Ball Z’s story.

item.title: Dragon Ball Super Proves Gohan s Strongest Form is Here to Stay With One Epic Scene
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGohan’s Beast transformation is here to stay, and may play a crucial role in upcoming story arcs. Gohan’s ability to call on the Gohan Beast form at will ensures he can keep up with new threats like Black Frieza. Gohan joining forces with Broly, Piccolo, Vegeta, and Goku to fight Black Frieza could be an epic moment in Dragon Ball Super. Literature ReviewDragon Ball Super chapter 101 proves that Gohan’s new Beast form isn’t going anywhere, as he pulls out once again in defense of his family.

item.title: Dragon Ball Super s Glorious Return Proves Haters Wrong
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYChapter #101 of Dragon Ball Super delivers what fans have been asking for, with Goku’s return and Gohan using again his new Beast form. Critics who were frustrated with the Super Hero arc have been proven wrong by the exciting developments in this chapter. The story is back in full gear, and the stage is set for a confrontation with a classic villain or the introduction of a new one.

item.title: Dragon Ball Super s Milestone Chapter Was A Huge Wasted Opportunity
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDragon Ball Super chapter #100 concludes the adaptation of Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero, disappointing fans who expected something big for the milestone chapter. The chapter does not set up the next story arc, leaving readers in the dark about what comes next for the franchise. Despite the lackluster chapter, there is anticipation for a future storyline involving the return of Frieza and his newfound power. Literature ReviewDragon Ball Super’s manga achieved a major milestone of 100 published chapters, but unfortunately, the series didn’t capitalize on that whatsoever.

item.title: Dragon Ball Super s Most Criticized Arc Actually Pays Off In New Saga
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDragon Ball Super’s newest saga is bridging two arcs without jumping ahead, unlike previous transitions, and it’s a step in the right direction. The series has had awkward transitions between sagas in the past, but it’s improving with the current unnamed saga. The Granolah the Survivor Saga is one of the few effective transitions in Dragon Ball Super, showing improvement in storytelling. Literature ReviewEven though the Super Hero is very unpopular, there’s one aspect of the unnecessarily adapted arc that greatly improves Super’s overall delivery.

item.title: Dragon Ball Super s Super Hero Arc Finally Redeemed Gohan In The Best Way
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Dragon Ball Super manga fixes Gohan’s neglectful parenting, showing his growth as a character and a father. The added scene between Gohan and Pan provides a satisfying ending to the movie’s story, and sets up Gohan’s future role in the series. Gohan’s redemption and newfound strength may lead to a more important role in Dragon Ball Super’s future. Literature ReviewThe manga adaptation of Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero has finally fixed an important issue with Gohan’s character.

item.title: Dragon Ball Super s True Final Boss Will Be a Hero Stronger Than Beerus - Theory
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGoku and Vegeta may be being groomed as successors to Beerus, and could face a final test by battling their master, Whis. A battle with Whis would put Goku’s abilities to the test and reveal the true extent of Whis’s power. While Goku may not become the next Destroyer, a match-up with Whis would represent the culmination of Goku’s training and allow him to finally defeat one of his masters.

item.title: Dragon Ball Super Super Hero Actually Set Up Pan s Major Victory in GT
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPan had major victory against the Red Ribbon Army in Dragon Ball GT, which was set up by Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero. In Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero, the Red Ribbon Army returns with advanced Androids and kidnaps Pan to lure out Gohan, but the plan backfires. In Dragon Ball GT episode #42, Pan single-handedly takes down the original Red Ribbon Army when they cause chaos after escaping from hell, marking her revenge on the group that kidnapped her in Super Hero.

item.title: Dragon Ball Super Super Hero Already Improved One of GT s Biggest Disappointments
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDragon Ball Super: Super Hero improves on Dragon Ball GT’s disappointing portrayal of Pan, giving her a more significant role and potential for growth. In Super Hero, Pan is already displaying advanced techniques and bravery, hinting at her potential to become a powerful fighter in the Dragon Ball series. Pan’s establishment in Super Hero suggests that she will surpass previous characters, showing that she won’t be limited to being just a strong fighter without significant victories or power-ups as she was in Dragon Ball GT.

item.title: Dragon Ball Super Teases Once Again That Gohan Has Surpassed Goku & Vegeta
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGohan has reclaimed his title as the strongest Z-Fighter after unlocking his Beast form. This comes from an observation made in the Dragon Ball Super manga, where Vegeta reports Bulma’s comments after witnessing Gohan Beast. Gohan’s immense potential has been brought up by several characters throughout the series, including Piccolo and Goku. Literature ReviewWhile Gohan has often been touted as the strongest warrior in the series, it appears that his latest power-up finally let him surpass Goku and Vegeta.

item.title: Dragon Ball Z Has a Genius Reason Why Super Saiyan 3 Is So Rare
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSuper Saiyan 3 is rarely seen because it drains a Saiyan’s ki significantly faster than other transformations, making it unsuitable for fights that require stamina. Super Saiyan 3 is a transformation meant for the Other World, or places where time doesn’t flow, as it uses up too much energy too quickly in the mortal realm. Examples from Dragon Ball Super and Fusion Reborn support the idea that Super Saiyan 3 should only be used in locations outside the flow of time, further emphasizing its rarity in the series.

item.title: DRAWING BLOOD Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Co-Creator Launches New Series With Image Comics
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTeenage Mutant Ninja Turtles co-creator Kevin Eastman returns with a new comic series, Drawing Blood, which blurs the lines between truth and fiction. The 12-issue series follows Shane Bookman, a cartoonist whose real life becomes more absurd and action-packed than his own comic book stories. Drawing Blood, with its mix of guns, drugs, and criminal activity, may be seen as a semi-autobiography from Eastman, who experienced success in the comic industry at a young age.

item.title: Dream Finally Explains the Core of His Power in Sandman Lore - Why Even He Has Limits
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDream’s abilities are governed by cosmic rules that both give him power and restrict him from interfering outside of his realm. Breaking these rules could disrupt the natural order and have major ripple effects, potentially causing unintended consequences. Following these rules actually makes Dream more powerful and maintains a truce between him and the other Endless beings. Literature ReviewIn an explanation that could only exist in The Sandman, Dream’s magic is a feat of circular logic that gives him unlimited power with limited use.

item.title: Duke #1 Kicks Off A Can t-Miss Origin for the New G.I. Joe (Review)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDuke #1 kicks off a new G.I. Joe era with action and intrigue, tying in closely with the Transformers franchise. Taking place before G.I. Joe and Cobra exist, Duke goes AWOL to uncover the truth about transforming alien robots. The issue introduces new characters, features surprise guest stars, and sets up a thrilling storyline for future issues in the Energon Universe. Literature ReviewA new era begins for G.I. Joe as the first issue of the Duke miniseries reveals the origins of the Real American Heroes in the Energon Universe.

item.title: DUNE s Official Prequel Trilogy To Conclude With House Corrino Series (Exclusive)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoom Studio’s graphic novel adaptation of Dune’s prequel trilogy will conclude with House Corrino series. The graphic novels have been well received by fans and have won industry awards. House Corrino will reveal the events leading up to the fall of House Atreides, changing the galaxy forever. Literature ReviewBoom Studio’s line of graphic novel adaptations of the Dune prequels comes to a conclusion with House Corrino. Boom Studio’s graphic novel adaptation of Dune’s prequel trilogy will conclude with a House Corrino series.

item.title: Dungeons & Dragons 10 Best Apps For D&D Players
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMobile apps can help streamline the complex aspects of playing Dungeons & Dragons, from tracking spells to managing character sheets. Apps like D&D Spellbook 5e and The 20 can help players keep track of their character’s abiliites. Others, such as NPC For Hire or MapKeeper are especially useful for dungeon masters in running a DnD campaign. Literature ReviewFrom character sheets to dice rollers to map trackers and everything between, these are the most useful apps for D&D players to use.

item.title: Edge of Spider-Verse Introduces New Take on Venom to Official Continuity
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarvel’s Edge of Spider-Verse introduces a chilling new character, Spooky-Man, who bears a striking resemblance to the iconic symbiote Venom. The debut of Spooky-Man and the return of Cyborg Spider-Man add excitement and intrigue to the highly anticipated Edge of Spider-Verse series. Spooky-Man’s character design shares notable similarities with Venom, raising questions about a possible connection between the two and adding depth to the unfolding narrative. Literature ReviewEdge of Spider-Verse weaves a web of excitement with its introduction of a new and potentially cooler version of Venom that might be deadlier, too.

item.title: Elijah Wood Teams With Oni Press for New Comic Imprint HIGH STRANGENESS
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYOni Press and SpectreVision are partnering to create a new comic imprint called High Strangeness, which will focus on paranormal stories. SpectreVision, co-founded by Elijah Wood and Daniel Noah, is known for producing psychological and thriller films and is now expanding into the comic industry. The imprint will explore themes of paranormal and supernatural phenomena, drawing inspiration from real documented cases and pushing the boundaries of traditional sci-fi and horror.

item.title: Emma Frost Has Perfected Iron Man and Captain America s Classic Combo Attack
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEmma Frost upstages Iron Man and Captain America with a deadly new twist on their iconic tag-team move. Emma Frost’s diamond form allows her to refract and control Iron Man’s repulsor blasts, taking the move to new heights. The growing bond between Iron Man and Emma Frost is symbolized by their powerful “blast refraction” team attack. Literature ReviewForget about reflecting a repulsor blast with a vibranium shield - Emma Frost is able to refract Iron Man’s beams throughout her entire body.

item.title: Emma Frost s Official Trading Card Art Is a Gift to X-Men Cosplayers
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYRussell Dauterman’s Marvel Trading Card series features a beautiful cover of Emma Frost, showcasing her iconic costume design for future cosplayers. Dauterman has a talent for creating stunning looks for Emma Frost, exemplified by her official Trading Card and previous illustrations. Emma Frost is a beloved character for cosplay due to her fashionable and fierce nature, and Dauterman’s design provides a perfect option for more casual cosplayers. Literature ReviewThe latest in Russell Dauterman’s Marvel Trading Card cover series features the iconic Emma Frost, wearing a perfect costume for any cosplayer.

item.title: End of an Era DC s Justice League Generation Officially Falls from Power
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Justice League has fallen to Garro’s spores, leaving the Titans to take control in DC’s new era. Amanda Waller refuses to acknowledge the shifting generational tides and tries to maintain old power structures. The Titans must show that they have surpassed their mentors and take charge in the Beast World event. Literature ReviewDC’s Beast World event hammers home that the Justice League has truly fallen form power — now is the time of the Titans in the DC Universe.

item.title: Energon Universe Confirms The Transformers Combat Has Deadly Consequences
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe battle between the Autobots and Decepticons in Transformers #3 has real consequences, as human characters experience the human cost of war. Spike getting wounded in the crossfire emphasizes the weight and impact of the battles in the Energon Universe. Optimus Prime feels responsible for humanity and shows his dedication by rushing to get Spike to safety, setting the stage for an epic confrontation in Transformers #4. Literature ReviewThe Autobots and Decepticons have gone to war once again in the new Energon Universe, but this time, the conflict has deadly consequences.

item.title: Epic Batman Cosplay Honors One Of the Dark Knight s Coolest Quotes
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBrad Johnson’s Batman cosplay pays homage to a stand-out quote from the comics, showcasing his deep appreciation for the character’s lore. Johnson’s cosplay skillfully bridges the gap between cinematic and comic book representations of the Caped Crusader. This cosplay not only displays a genuine love for Batman, but also serves as a call to action, urging DC to bring the unrealized Ben Affleck Batman movie to fruition, highlighting the passionate dedication of the fanbase.

item.title: Even Dragon Ball Super Admits How it Mishandled Gohan Until Super Hero
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDespite his achievements in Dragon Ball Z, Gohan’s character is cast out of the spotlight in Dragon Ball Super, as proved by the latest chapter when Beerus doesn’t know who Gohan is. In Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero, the half-Saiyan unlocks a new form known as “Gohan Beast.” This new transformation is an important step towards redeeming Gohan in the future, as proved by the latest chapter of the manga.

item.title: Even Scarlet Witch s Power Level Can t Match Avengers New Superhuman
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYScarlet Witch faces a new group, the Twilight Court, and is at a disadvantage in Avengers #8. Mordred, the Witch from the Twilight Court, can unravel Scarlet Witch’s magic despite her power. Scarlet Witch could overpower Mordred if she figures out how her powers are being unraveled. Literature ReviewScarlet Witch is one of the most powerful magic users in the Marvel Universe, but she may have met an unexpected match with the newest superhero team.

item.title: Even the Spider-Man from Hell Gets More Respect than Peter Parker
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYRek-Rap, the demon sidekick of Spider-Man, receives more praise and glory for his minimal work than Peter Parker ever has for his major heroic efforts. Despite Peter Parker doing the difficult hero work and saving the day, it is Rek-Rap who is granted a parade in Limbo, even though he was on the sidelines for the majority of the battle, which Peter handled. Peter Parker, once again, fails to get the recognition he deserves, another instance of the infamous Parker Luck.

item.title: Even Wolverine s Adamantium Can t Survive Fantastic Four s New Weapon
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Fantastic Four’s children accidentally invent a universal solvent that can eat through anything, including Wolverine’s claws. The solvent was created as a school project and ended up being a dangerous weapon that dropped in the Fantastic Four’s lap. Having a weapon that can permanently put down Wolverine is a good thing for the Fantastic Four due to their history with the X-Men and the potential for their relationship to deteriorate again.

item.title: Even Wolverine s Healing Factor Struggles to Survive 1 R-Rated Weapon
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWolverine’s healing factor is put to the ultimate test when faced with the Predator’s R-rated acid spray. The acid spray melts Wolverine’s face, leaving him unconscious and requiring the help of Weapon X scientists to make a full recovery. The implications of Wolverine’s vulnerability to acid raise concerns for his survival against Xenomorphs in a potential future crossover with the Alien franchise. Literature ReviewWolverine’s healing factor has saved his life more times than fans can count, but it nearly failed him after going up against one R-rated weapon!

item.title: Even X-Men s Worst Enemies Fear Doctor Doom
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYOrchis, the anti-hate group targeting mutants, is afraid to provoke a conflict with Doctor Doom, keeping his mutants in the country of Latveria safe. The X-Men are seeking out allies in their fight against Orchis, leading them to send emissaries to Latveria, but they are met with strong opposition from Doctor Doom and his Legion of Mutants. Orchis should remain cautious of invading Latveria; at least the mutant population of the small, but imposing nation should hope so, as Orchis’ fear of provoking a conflict with Doctor Doom is crucial to their survival.

item.title: Every Arc from Grant Morrison s New X-Men, Ranked
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGrant Morrison’s New X-Men introduced fresh ideas and breathed new life into the franchise, ranking among the best arcs. “E is for Extinction” was the standout arc, bringing the X-Men into the 21st century with innovations that left a lasting impact. The controversial “Planet X” arc featured a major plot twist and introduced the infamous Xorn/Magneto affair, which was later retconned by Marvel. Literature ReviewGrant Morrison and a host of collaborators shook up the mutant formula with New X-Men.

item.title: Every Far Side Comic That Makes Fun of Superman (Ranked from Goofy to Hilarious)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGary Larson took swipes at DC’s Superman in his comics, making fun of the character and his iconic status. Larson mostly places Superman in mundane settings, such as feuds with neighbors and marital discord. Richard Donner’s 1978 Superman movie likely influenced Larson the most, and clearly influenced his best Superman parody. Literature ReviewGary Larson’s The Far Side is known for its surreal take on the natural world, but the comic also took on pop culture, even mocking Superman.

item.title: Every Honkai Star Rail 2.0 Livestream Code & Reward
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHonkai: Star Rail 2.0 livestream codes offer in-game rewards like Character EXP Material and Stellar Jade as a thank-you to players. The 2.0 livestream introduces a big update for the RPG, including a new destination called Penacony and new characters obtainable with Stellar Jade. Players can redeem the codes in-game or on the official Honkai: Star Rail website to receive the rewards in their in-game mailbox. Literature ReviewHoYoverse announced the arrival of Penacony in Honkai: Star Rail 2.

item.title: Every Jujutsu Kaisen Arc Ranked From Worst to Best
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWhile all Jujutsu Kaisen arcs have their merits, some stand out as being a cut above the rest. Some arcs succeed because of their excellent writing and action, whereas others fail because of their short length and adding little to the story. Not every arc in Jujutsu Kaisen is a standout story arc, but they all have something to offer, nonetheless. Literature ReviewAfter being serialized for over 5 years Jujutsu Kaisen has a variety of arcs, all of which are great but some of which are better than others.

item.title: Every Manga That Left Weekly Shonen Jump In 2023
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWeekly Shonen Jump ’s strict cancellation policy results in many manga being ended due to low sales or poor reception, leading to a ruthless reputation. Some manga in 2023 ended naturally or because authors chose to discontinue, but the high number of cancelations is worth noting. Several manga, such as High School Family and PPPPPP were canceled due to low rankings, poor execution, lack of originality, or niche appeal.

item.title: Every Marvel Superhero Should Hate Daredevil For One Big Reason
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDaredevil inadvertently gave Kingpin the idea to run for Mayor, leading to the chaos in “Devil’s Reign.” Kingpin’s anti-hero campaign as Mayor resulted in superheroes being banned from NYC and imprisoned. Daredevil is now facing backlash from Marvel heroes for his connection to Kingpin’s mayoral run. Literature ReviewA flashback story reveals that Daredevil essentially screwed over the Marvel Universe in a big way, and if its heroes knew, they’d hate him for it.

item.title: Every My Hero Academia Awakened Quirk User
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYQuirk awakenings in My Hero Academia involve extreme situations and strong emotions, making characters with Awakened Quirks among the strongest. Geten’s ice quirk evolution allowed him to manipulate ice shape and temperature, and freeze the whole water supply of a city. Uraraka’s awakening extended her Quirk’s range, allowing her to float targets without direct contact. Literature ReviewA few My Hero Academia characters have awakened their quirks after facing life-or-death situations, putting them among the strongest in the story.

item.title: Every Star Trek Movie Comic Book Adaptation, Ranked
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYStar Trek movie comic book adaptations have been released by various publishers throughout the franchise’s history. Some of the adaptations took liberties with the original scripts, but still featured awesome and poignant moments. The comic book adaptations provide fans with additional scenes and perspectives that were not in the final movies. Literature ReviewComic book adaptations of Star Trek movies used to be the rage, and here is every single one of them, ranked worst to best.

item.title: Every Time Link Transformed In The Legend of Zelda, Ranked By How Weird It Is
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTransformations in The Legend of Zelda are varied and unique, ranging from magical items to curses and more. These transformations grant Link access to new abilities and can be advantageous in his quests. Regardless of how they occur, Link always uses his transformations to his advantage, even turning curses against his enemies. Literature ReviewLink can transform in many different ways throughout the Legend of Zelda series, with the details of some changes being stranger than others.

item.title: Every Type of Isekai Creates a Ridiculously Overpowered Hero in Wild Manga
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYOversummoned, Overpowered, and Over It! masterfully combines a variety of classic isekai premises that provide a protagonist with over-the-top powers in a subversive way. The manga justifies incorporating a common trope in a more satisfying way than its contemporaries, adding a level of satirical self-awareness to the series. The unique instance of multiple powers is explained by a clever twist that cancels them out, fitting with the accidental summoning premise.

item.title: Every Version of The Joker s Batsuit in DC Comics Canon
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAt various times in DC Comics history, the Joker has donned his own version of the Batsuit; from cosplaying as Batman, to Dark Multiverse versions of Bruce Wayne who became the “Batman Who Laughs.” In a twisted turn, Joker was even given his very own Batsuit by Batman, enhancing his durability and weaponizing him against superpowered zombies. The Joker’s war suit, equipped with Wayne Tech, granted him night vision, an explosive batarang, and the ability to disrupt communication lines as he wreaked havoc on Gotham.

item.title: Everyone Knew X-Men s Krakoa Would Fail - Except the X-Men
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYKrakoa’s downfall was predicted long ago, with Doctor Doom being one of many skeptics. Doctor Doom accurately predicted that Xavier’s involvement would lead to Krakoa’s failure. Doom’s predictions have been startlingly accurate, raising concerns about Xavier’s future self-destruction. Literature ReviewKrakoa once seemed like a great idea for the X-Men, but now it seems multiple people were right to not believe in the dream as it manifested. Warning: Spoilers for X-Men #29!

item.title: Exactly How Fast Captain America Is in Marvel Continuity
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCaptain America’s top speed is likely sitting upwards of 25mph, making him one of the fastest non-speed-power-based heroes in the Marvel Universe. In a fight against Gambit, it is explicitly stated that Cap can run a 40-yard dash in 3.82 seconds and break the world record for running the mile by one minute and fifteen seconds. Cap’s super-soldier abilities, military-bred stamina, and experience as a superhero contribute to his impressive speed and make him one of the most well-balanced and quickest heroes in the Marvel Universe.

item.title: Exclusive Ahoy s WRONG EARTH Returns With Awesome Hip Hop Homage Covers
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAhoy Comics has announced Wrong Earth: Dead Ringers, a new five-issue series featuring Dragonflyman and Stinger. The Wrong Earth series remixes superhero tropes and pays homage to music history with comic covers inspired by classic band photos. Wrong Earth: Dead Ringers delivers fistfights in space and secret identity crises. Available March 13, 2024. Literature ReviewScreen Rant exclusively announces the return of Wrong Earth, with the newest series - Wrong Earth: Dead Ringers from Ahoy Comics, coming in 2024.

item.title: Exclusive Cover Reveal for TWO New Hellboy Releases
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHellboy fans rejoice! Two new comic collections featuring the iconic character are set to release in 2024, just in time for the upcoming cinematic reboot. The collections, Hellboy: The Crooked Man & The Return of Effie Kolb and Hellboy and the B.P.R.D.: 1955 - 1957, offer classic stories for both new and longtime fans to enjoy. These must-have collections provide a perfect introduction to Hellboy’s early adventures and are a great way to prepare for his return to the mainstream in 2024.

item.title: Exclusive Deathstalker Coming from Guns N Roses Guitarist Slash
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDeathstalker #1 is an exciting new comic collaboration between Slash from Guns N’ Roses and Vault Comics, bringing back the cult classic movie franchise from 1983. The preview reveals the return of the titular hero and introduces key plot elements, showcasing the pulpy elements of the genre. The creative team, including Slash, Steven Kostanski, Tim Seeley, Jim Terry, and Kurt Michael Russell, aims to deliver a thrilling and nostalgic fantasy story that combines elements of horror, magic, sex, and thrills.

item.title: Exclusive First Look Archie Comics Superhero THE JAGUAR Officially Returns
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Jaguar #1 brings back the iconic character for long-time fans and serves as an introduction for new readers. The comic showcases a blend of classic and modern storytelling, revitalizing the character with a distinct identity. Archie Comics has been gradually bringing back older characters, and The Jaguar joins the lineup. Literature ReviewArchie Comics is bringing back its Silver Age superhero, The Jaguar, as a new character takes up the mantle in an upcoming one-shot for early 2024.

item.title: Exclusive Hit Webtoon SUBZERO Lands Print Edition This September From Oni Press
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSubZero, the hit webcomic from Webtoon, is getting a print release in partnership with Oni Press, giving fans the opportunity to add it to their collections this Fall. The story follows Princess Clove as she marries Prince Kyro in an effort to end the war between their clans, the Azure Clan and the Crimson Clan. SubZero Vol. 1, which collects episodes 0-25, will feature a new cover from Junepurrr and include never-before-published back matter material.

item.title: Exclusive Stout Club s New Comic Lineup Revealed at #CCXP2023
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYStout Club Entertainment announces three new Comixology Originals at Brazil’s Comic Con, featuring fantasy, adventure, and generational competition stories. The three projects include a fantasy series about a stolen package, an adventure series set in the frozen Mistland, and a graphic novel about rival pizzaiolos teaming up. The creative teams for these comics include award-winning writers and artists, such as Rafael Albuquerque, Eduardo Medeiros, and Felipe Castilho. The comics are scheduled for release in 2024.

item.title: Exclusive The Hellboy Winter Special The Yule Cat Gives Children s Folklore A Terrifying Twist
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHellboy Winter Special: The Yule Cat takes inspiration from Icelandic folklore, featuring a giant cat that hunts people before Christmas Eve. The one-shot comic is an excellent jumping-on-point for new readers, with action-packed adventure and attention to detail that will please long-standing fans. The creative team, led by writer/artist Matt Smith, has put a lot of thought and effort into bringing the Yule Cat to life. Literature ReviewJust in time for the winter season, Screen Rant has an exclusive look at the creative process for Hellboy Winter Special: The Yule Cat.

item.title: Exclusive The Legacy of Wu Tang Clan s Ol Dirty Bastard To Be Celebrated in New Homage From Oni Press
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWu-Tang Clan’s ODB will be reimagined in an original graphic novel by Oni Press, providing fans with a new perspective on the co-founder that showcases his many identities. The graphic novel will contribute to Wu-Tang Clan’s legacy and offer fans the opportunity to purchase exclusive merchandise inspired by ODB, including action figures and vinyl. The anthology will feature numerous creators and artists, including Eisner-nominated Ron Wimberly, and will take readers on a journey through a fractured New York City that combines different versions of its buroughs.

item.title: Exclusive The NacelleVerse Launches With Zero Issue First-Looks
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNacelleVerse #0 will introduce characters and plot points that will set the foundation for a multi-year plan in comics and animation. The NacelleVerse universe will merge iconic properties like Biker Mice From Mars, Roboforce, Sectaurs, and Power Lords. The debut issue will bring together diverse characters and promise a big adventure with the talents of Melissa Flores and other creators. Literature ReviewNacelleVerse #0 from Oni Press will kick off the animation and toy-inspired universe, telling new stories featuring Biker Mice From Mars and more!

item.title: Exclusive The Ultimate Batman Collection is Coming in DC BATMAN From Folio Society
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFolio Society’s upcoming DC: Batman is a stunning collection of classic comics featuring the Caped Crusader, curated by Jennette Kahn; the hardcover includes twelve pivotal issues that trace Batman’s growth across decades. In addition to the dozen issues reprinted in the book, DC: Batman comics with a replica copy of Batman #1, the debut issue of the character’s enduring solo series. This hardcover compendium explores the adventures and pathology of Batman across his career, showcasing the evolution of the character and his enduring impact on the graphic medium.

item.title: Expanding Power Rangers History Before the Classic 1990s Team Sets the Franchise Up To Thrive Long Term
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoom! Studios’ Power Rangers comic books have revealed that there were Ranger teams before the classic 1990s squad, dramatically expanding the franchise’s lore. The addition of these old Ranger teams, such as the Omega Rangers and Solar Rangers, is crucial for the long-term success of Power Rangers. The comics complement the TV shows by providing new context, and informing readers about the larger mythology of the the Power Rangers universe, enhancing fans’ experience of the franchise.

item.title: Fantastic Four Confirms a Gross Detail About Reed Richards Stretching Powers
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFantastic Four #17 presents the team with a time travel mystery, as they discover an ancient skeleton that turns out to be the Invisible Woman. The issue also reveals some of Reed Richards’ biology, showcasing his ‘stretchy’ skeleton. The wild detail raises questions about the weirder aspects of his powers, and deviates from past details about his body. Literature ReviewAs the Fantastic Four investigate a mysterious time travel murder, Reed Richards’ inhuman biology is exposed with a surprising secret.

item.title: Fantastic Four Just Made Reed Richards Powers Even More Disturbing
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYReed Richards,Mr. Fantastic, demonstrates the scary extent of his ability to change and mold his body in Fantastic Four #14, showcasing his mastery over his physical abilities, despite being known for his intellect. Reed’s incredible physical feats, such as encasing opponents or creating protective shields, make him a formidable and frightening hero. Reed’s uncanny ability to sprout new limbs and create multiple appendages expands his presence, showing that his physical powers are nearly as limitless as his mental prowess.

item.title: Fantastic Four This Early Multiverse Story Is the Perfect Way to Bring Marvel s First Family Into the MCU (Without Doing an Origin Story)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Fantastic Four could be introduced into the MCU through this early reality-hopping story, providing a seamless way for them to join as fully-realized heroes without the need for an origin story. Marvel’s Fantastic Four were pioneers of the company’s early Multiverse stories, with their early adventures paving the way for the expansive storytelling that defines Marvel today. Adapting Fantastic Four (Volume 1) #161-163 would not only open new storytelling vectors for the MCU by exploring other dimensions, but it would also build upon Reed Richards’ cameo in Doctor Strange and the Multiverse of Madness.

item.title: Faster Than A Speeding Bullet...Almost One Moment Proves the Difference Between Spider-Man and Superman
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYIn Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man #1 , Spider-Man demonstrates surprising speed by catching a bullet, a feat that showcases his potential power. Peter Parker’s training with Captain America teaches him the importance of concentration and calculated action, which he puts into practice against a new villain, Tracer. Spider-Man’s reliance on his instincts, rather than formal training, limits his effectiveness as a superhero, but he has always displayed incredible potential, and only needs discipline and focus to better himself.

item.title: First 10 Villains Who Defeated Batman In DC Comics (In Chronological Order)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBatman’s earliest major losses helped shape him into the character he is today, in addition to contributing to the shift in superhero narratives, as heroes now more frequently face sustained adversity. Ra’s al Ghul, Bronze Tiger, and the Reaper were among the earliest villains to defeat Batman, teaching him valuable lessons and pushing him to his limits. Bane’s defeat of Batman during the “Knightfall” story arc is considered his most decisive defeat, as Bane outsmarted and brutally beat Batman in a fight that changed the Dark Knight forever.

item.title: First Glimpse of X-Men s Post-Krakoa World Confirms 1 Mutant Still Alive
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYX-Men’s new era begins after the fall of Krakoa at the Hellfire Gala. Fans can get a glimpse in Free Comic Book Day 2024: Blood Hunt/X-Men #1. Jubilee survives and embarks on a journey to where it all began. Speculation points to a return to the X-Mansion, a classic X-Men landmark. The Krakoan era revitalized the X-Men, and the new era may bring a return to the franchise’s roots with an emphasis on the classics.

item.title: First Look at Netflix Sequel FATE THE WINX SAGA Vol. 1 (Exclusive)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNetflix is resurrecting Fate: The Winx Saga after its cancelation with a graphic novel sequel, giving the show’s cult following a chance to find out what is in store for the series’ beloved characters. The upcoming graphic novel, titled Fate: The Winx Saga Vol. 1 Dark Destiny, will continue the story from where Season 2 left off. Writer Olivia Cuartero-Briggs promises a “female-centric and character-driven narrative”, ensuring the beloved fictional universe is in capable hands.

item.title: First-Look BLACK SOLSTICE From Oscar Winners Martin Desmond Roe & Travon Free (Exclusive)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYOscar-winning filmmakers Desmond Roe and Travon Free art set to release the graphic novel Black Solstice, published by Dark Horse Comics, building a narrative world around the genesis of a social media joke. The graphic novel draws inspiration from a viral social media meme, which suggested black people would gain superpowers on December 21, 2020. The opening pages of Black Solstice establish the powers gained by black people, reactions from non-black individuals, and the ongoing study of the phenomenon, diving into the myriad possibilities of this unique concept.

item.title: Flash Cosplay Demonstrates How His Maximum Speed Should Actually Look
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCosplayer Bew has created an incredibly realistic portrayal of the Flash, challenging DC’s own depiction in terms of believability and accuracy by incorporating elements of real-world science. The cosplay includes visual effects that attempts to depict the optical effects of blueshift and redshift, grounding the Flash’s superhuman speed in the realm of physics. Cosplay artists like Bew are uniquely able to expand the boundaries of canonical representation, offering fresh, exciting, and ultimately satisfying glimpses into different versions of beloved characters.

item.title: Flash Has a Hidden Power that Would Make Superman Jealous
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFlash demonstrates a surprising power against mind control attacks, thanks to his ability to think faster than any spellbinder’s charms. The evil Raven’s abilities are amplified by the Helmet of Hate, which also allows her to tap into the power of the Lords of Chaos. Unlike Superman, the Flash never has to worry about his thoughts being manipulated, making him immune to villains turning him evil. Literature ReviewFlash and Superman have always competed over who was faster, but the Man of Steel can’t hold a candle to one of Wally West’s best secret powers.

item.title: Flash Is Famous for Caring About His Villains - But DC Confirms He s Failed a Major Foe
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFlash’s lack of care for Grodd could have dire consequences for his career and the DC Universe. Jai West’s interaction with Grodd reveals that communication and compassion could potentially resolve the conflict. If Flash doesn’t reach out to his enemies like Grodd, the DC Universe may suffer unnecessarily. Literature ReviewOne major oversight when it comes to how the Flash treats one of his most notable villains is accidentally putting the entire DC Universe at risk.

item.title: Flash Just Became DC s Darkest Hero, As His Full Powers Are Finally Revealed
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFlash’s powers have unintended consequences, causing unknown destruction on other layers of reality. Wally West and other speedsters have been causing damage with their speed, unbeknownst to them. Flash must reconsider how he uses his powers as they are actively harming other dimensions and sentient beings. Literature ReviewThe darkest side of the Flash’s powers comes to light when Wally West discovers that using the Speed Force is harming unseen layers of reality.

item.title: Flash s Experimental New Status Quo Shines in Trippy Official Art
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Flash #6 variant cover perfectly captures the fun and strange vibe of the current era. The Fastest Man Alive continues to navigate through the unknown and complicated parts of the DCU. The current Flash run is experimental and innovative, exploring wild layers of reality and introducing strange cosmic entities. Literature ReviewJames Stokoe’s variant cover for the upcoming Flash #6 perfectly captures the strange cosmic journey Wally West is undergoing in his current run.

item.title: Flash s Latest Upgrade Is So Intense, It Belongs in a Horror Movie
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFlash and his loved ones embrace their wild side to stop “Beast World” chaos by transforming into bees. The Flash Family becomes a swarm of bees to defeat Godspeed and remove the spore, ending his reign of terror. The transformed Flash Family can handle the infected hybrids, allowing the Titans to focus on stopping Garro and resolving the global calamity. Literature ReviewAs “Beast World” intensifies, the Flash Family faces an old enemy with a terrifying new upgrade and has no choice but to take on disturbing new forms.

item.title: Flash s Lord of the Rings Moment Is the Perfect Fandom Crossover
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFlash’s actions in Titans: Beast World #6 mirror Frodo’s iconic Mount Doom scene in Lord of the Rings, as he destroys a malevolent artifact by dropping it into a volcano. The Lord of Chaos Helm in the comic serves as a parallel to the corrupting Ruling Ring in Lord of the Rings, both possessing the ability to corrupt the wearer and being destroyed in fiery depths. Given the striking similarities between the scenes, it is highly likely that writer Tom Taylor intentionally referenced Lord of the Rings in this issue, leaving fans eager to discover more future fandom references in his works.

item.title: Flash s New Codename Reveals His True Importance to the DC Universe
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Flash has been given the nickname “Cynosure” because of his central importance to the DC Universe and his impact on reality. Wally West’s powers have evolved to allow him to shift his aura into different levels of reality, giving him immense power and making him comparable to Superman. Wally West’s new status as the “Cynosure” could have significant implications for the entire multiverse, and it’s up to the rest of the DC Universe to keep up with him.

item.title: Flash s New Origin Ties Him to a Major Villain - & Reveals a Stunning Betrayal
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYJay Garrick’s origin story has been retconned, revealing his mentor as a villain and exposing corrupt activities within S.T.A.R Labs. S.T.A.R Labs, a prominent metahuman research center in the DC Universe, is shown to have been secretly funding Dr. Elemental’s twisted experiments. The loss of S.T.A.R Labs has led to Supercorp and Steelworks emerging as the new main metahuman research centers in DC Comics. Literature ReviewIn a huge retcon to the Flash’s origin, Jay Garrick’s mentor is revealed to be a villain, and the entirety of S.

item.title: Flash s New Reality-Altering Powers Officially Make Him More Powerful Than Superman
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFlash has evolved to a godlike level of power, surpassing Superman as DC’s most powerful hero. Wally West can now access and influence the fundamental forces of reality, allowing him to alter the laws of physics and nature. However, Flash’s new powers come with potentially apocalyptic consequences, as he doesn’t fully understand how to control them and can unwittingly cause chaos on other levels of reality. Literature ReviewAs Flash unlocks the ability to ‘step out’ of reality, he discovers that he can rewrite the laws of physics on a whim, surpassing even Superman.

item.title: Flash s New Weakness Isn t Just Deadly - It Proves He ll Never Be Happy
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWally West discovers a still paradise that brings him profound serenity but also makes him realize he can never truly be at peace. Flash’s glitching superpowers have caused him distress, exposing him to terrifying alternate realities. Flash’s desire to pause and enjoy life clashes with his dedication to justice, leaving him unable to find the peace he yearns for. Literature ReviewFlash’s new powers have been seriously messing him up, but they’ve also revealed the Scarlet Speedster’s most tragic and unattainable wish.

item.title: Flash s Speed Can t Beat DC s New Anti-Speedster Weapon
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Flash encounters a new anti-speedster weapon that exists as a place, not an object, challenging even his super speed. Wally West is drawn to the Gallery, a serene location that poses a threat as it erases his memory the longer he stays, putting him at risk of being trapped there. The Gallery becomes the Flash’s version of Black Mercy, an illusion-inducing plant, as it ensnares Wally in a state of bliss that speed cannot break.

item.title: Flash Showcases a Heartbreaking New Twist on His Healing Factor
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Flash’s healing factor can also heal emotional wounds, allowing him to process intense distress in the middle of a battle. The chaos in “Beast World” is causing destruction and turning people into animal-hybrid creatures. Flash’s ability to alter his perception of time gives him the opportunity to take care of his mental health during intense battles. Literature ReviewThe Flash might be able to heal physical wounds in an instant, but he’s got a way of processing intense emotional trauma in the blink of an eye.

item.title: Flash Villain Godspeed Debuts Nightmare-Fuel New Transformation
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGodspeed’s transformation into a horrifying wasp-like creature makes him one of the most terrifying villains The Flash has ever faced. Godspeed’s abilities, such as being in two places at once, have always made him terrifying, but his transformation into a literal monster takes it to a whole new level. Godspeed becoming a superfast serial killer wasp is nightmare fuel and unlikely to be forgotten by Barry Allen or Flash fans anytime soon.

item.title: Flashs Son Has a New Power No Other Speedster Has (& It s Kind of Gross)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFlash’s son, Jai, has a unique and disgusting power that separates him from other speedsters - negative feelings take physical form and he can transport to wherever his father is when scared. Recent changes to the Speed Force have affected the Flash Family, including Jai, who has been struggling with distressing aberrations and new powers. Jai’s power to generate his own conduits makes him the only Flash Family member capable of instant transportation to anywhere in the world, potentially making him a more powerful hero than his father.

item.title: Forget About Luke Skywalker, Star Wars Most Unlikely Hero Just Ruined All Palpatine s Plans
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDoctor Aphra has discovered an ancient Jedi temple and a book that could be one of the sacred Jedi texts. There is a possibility that Aphra may give the book to Luke Skywalker, playing a role in the restoration of the Jedi Order. Despite Emperor Palpatine’s efforts to erase the Jedi from history, Doctor Aphra may play a role in bringing back their legacy. Literature ReviewAlthough Emperor Palpatine tried snuffing out the history and legacy of the Jedi Order, one Star Wars hero besides Luke may be undoing all that work.

item.title: Forget Kryptonite - Superman Designed the Ultimate Failsafe Against His Own Powers
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSuperman has a gadget that can render him powerless by preventing his cells from absorbing yellow sunlight, making it the most effective way to defeat him. The Kryptonian ability to absorb yellow sunlight was well-known on Krypton, prompting the creation of technology to block sunlight absorption. Superman’s desire to be a part of humanity and his collection of Kryptonian technology in his Fortress of Solitude led to his possession of the technology to disable his own powers.

item.title: Forget the Batmobile Batman s Bat-Tricycle Roars through Gotham in Official Art
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGotham’s streets are about to witness a different kind of vehicular mayhem as Batman trades in the iconic Batmobile for the surprising Bat-Tricycle. The visually stunning variant cover of Batman #145 features a demonic-looking Batman tearing through Gotham on a tricycle. This issue promises an exhilarating and unpredictable journey as Batman engineers an escape from Zur-En-Arrh’s prison, following the revelations in The Joker: Year One. Literature ReviewYikes! It looks like the Batmobile just lost a wheel!

item.title: Forget the Force - Chewbacca s Neck Strength Is Star Wars Most Unbelievable Power
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYChewbacca’s neck strength is more impressive than the Force, as he demonstrates by ripping the head off a droid with his teeth. The feat of Chewbacca biting the head off a durable droid is unlike anything fans have seen in Star Wars, making it truly impressive and unbelievable. While the Force grants god-like power, the idea that anyone, including a Wookie, can use their bite force to rip off a droid’s head is even more unbelievable.

item.title: Frieza Can Kill Beerus - Dragon Ball Super s Next Arc Has a Big Opportunity It Shouldn t Pass
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBlack Frieza’s power and wits could be enough to kill Beerus and disrupt the balance of the Dragon Ball universe. Frieza is willing to use any means necessary to achieve his goals, including destroying the Supreme Kai, Beerus’ secret weakness.
