item.description: SUMMARYWorf and Sulu’s bitter rivalry in Star Trek: The Last Generation results in an intense and epic fight between the two iconic characters. In this alternate timeline, Worf is a cruel tyrant ruling over Earth and Sulu leads a rebellion against him, earning the codename “the Silver Ghost.” Worf underestimates Sulu, leading to his own demise, but not before he kills Sulu in their final battle, ending their long-simmering rivalry.

item.title: WWE 2K24 Standard, Deluxe, & Forty Years of WrestleMania Edition Differences
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWWE 2K24 has announced four editions ahead of release, and pre-orders are already available. The Standard Edition includes the game itself, a free month of Peacock, and the Nightmare Family Pack if pre-ordered. The Deluxe Edition and 40 Years of WrestleMania Edition include unique covers, a Season Pass for DLC, and early access, along with additional in-game bonuses. Literature ReviewWWE 2K24 (along with WrestleMania 40) is coming soon. Here are all the different editions, what they include, and how they’re available for purchase.

item.title: X-Files Meets Ex Machina in Exclusive Preview of New Sci-Fi Series BOXED
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoxed is an upcoming ComiXology original graphic novel that explores the dangers of AI as it gains intelligence. The story follows a special agent tasked with stopping a rogue AI that belongs to the CDC. The creative team behind Boxed includes Mark Sable, Jeremy Haun, Nick Filardi, and Thomas Mauer, bringing together incredible comic creators for this psychological techno-thriller. Literature ReviewScreen Rant has an exclusive preview of Boxed, an original graphic novel from Amazon’s ComiXology originals line of digital comic content.

item.title: X-Men 97 Prelude Comic Will Prepare Fans For Iconic New Reboot
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe X-Men ‘97 animated series is highly anticipated by fans and the prelude comic will tie directly into the upcoming show. The creative team behind X-Men ‘92: House of XCII, Steve Foxe and Salva Espín, are the perfect choice for the prelude comic. Todd Nauck’s cover art for X-Men ‘97 #1 pays homage to the iconic art of the original X-Men: The Animated Series. Literature ReviewThe beloved X-Men: TAS is getting a series reboot, with Marvel releasing an X-Men ‘97 prelude comic from the creators of X-Men ‘92: House of XCII.

item.title: X-Men & TMNT Team-Up Art Will Have You Begging for an Official Crossover
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEpic tribute artwork brings together X-Men and Ninja Turtles in a crossover like never before. Mutants unite! Art imagines a multiversal war as the Foot Clan and Brotherhood team up with Magneto to take on the X-Men and Turtles. Fans eagerly await a comic book crossover between these two iconic teams, with their shared values of family and equality. Literature ReviewArtist Dan Hipp creates an incredible comic book art crossover with the X-Men and the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles characters teaming up.

item.title: X-Men 10 Essential Blob Villain Moments Fans Should Remember (Now That He s a Hero)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Blob debuted as a mutant villain who believed he was superior to the X-Men, even defeating them all at once. He joined both Magneto’s Brotherhood of Evil Mutants and Mystique’s Freedom Force, acting as an extension of governmental authority. The Blob has been involved in assassination attempts, attacked his own teammates, dealt mutant growth hormone, and joined Miss Sinister to kill the X-Men before eventually siding with the Uncanny Avengers against the Mutant Liberation Front.

item.title: X-Men 10 Ways the Original 1980s Mutant Massacre Shaped the Franchise Today
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMutant Massacre reshaped X-Men lore through its violent depiction of a world where mutants are hated and a society of mutants is slaughtered. It introduced significant X-Men villains such as Mr. Sinister, who continued to terrorize the X-Men for decades. The event marked the beginning of Wolverine and Sabretooth’s iconic rivalry and changed the character of Colossus forever by forcing him to kill for the first time. Literature ReviewThe Mutant Massacre is one of the most impactful events, creating ripples that can still be felt to this day.

item.title: X-Men Confirms 1 Founding Member s Power Have a Major Secret Weakness
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAs revealed in The Original X-Men #1, Angel’s wings can be easily grounded by removing crucial “flight feathers”. Warren’s wings are visually stunning but impractical and easily injured, as his history has made clear time and again. Warren has compensated for his weakness for the years, most notably when his original wings were amputated and replaced with steel wings, granted by Apocalypse in exchange for serving him as a Horseman.

item.title: X-Men Confirms a Disgusting Fan Theory About Mystique s Powers
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMystique’s shape-shifting powers allow her to create cavities in her body to store weapons, confirming a long-standing fan theory. Uncanny Spider-Man #4 reveals that Mystique used a bazooka in her attack on Orchis, showcasing her deadly abilities. The issue leaves some unanswered questions about Mystique’s ability, such as whether her stashed weapons would be detected by conventional methods. Literature ReviewFor years, fans have debated the extent of Mystique’s powers, and now a disgusting theory about her has been confirmed.

item.title: X-Men Confirms a Major Mutant Power Is Now a Permanent Part of Marvel Lore
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe X-Men’s Red Triangle Protocol is a powerful defense against psychic attacks, saving them in times of crisis. The protocol is an instinctive response that alerts the X-Men when they are being psychically attacked. The X-Men’s enemies, like Orchis, also have their own psychic defenses, emphasizing the importance of such protections in the superhero world. Literature ReviewThe X-Men’s psychic resistance, the Red Triangle Protocol, saved them at the 2023 Hellfire Gala, and it looks like this defense is here to stay.

item.title: X-Men Debuts Kitty Pryde s Ultimate Form, Finally Unlocking Her Full Powers
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYKate Pryde’s consumption of a Death Seed grants her extreme new powers, including long-range use of her phasing abilities and the ability to fold space for teleportation. The Death Seed has been used in the past to transform heroes into powerful villains who are obsessed with “pruning” humanity for the betterment of evolution. Kate’s transformation into Shadowtiger represents the dark endpoint of her choices and serves as a warning of what she could become if the X-Men’s final battle goes wrong.

item.title: X-Men Every Member of the Magneto Family (And Their Relationship to Its Patriarch)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMagneto’s complex relationships with his children, such as Scarlet Witch and Quicksilver, have evolved over time. Lorna Dane, aka Polaris, is Magneto’s only living biological child and has a tumultuous history with him. Magneto’s family extends beyond his biological children, including grandchildren, in-laws, and other connections through marriage and chosen family. Literature ReviewThe iconic X-Men antihero Magneto has a vast network of biological, chosen, and secret family, who all have complex relationships to their patriarch.

item.title: X-Men Finally Reveals The Terrible Secret Behind The Coming Dominion
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYImmortal X-Men #18 reveals the dark secret of Enigma, the mutant god Dominion, setting up the X-Men’s final confrontation. Mother Righteous fails in her bid to ascend to Dominion, ending her manipulation of the X-Men. The Enigma from Immortal X-Men #18 is most likely the same Enigma from Al Ewing’s Defenders: Beyond. Literature ReviewImmortal X-Men #18 reveals the dark secret of the coming Dominion, unveiling that the celestial AI is Enigma, the 5th “child” of Nathaniel Essex.

item.title: X-Men Finally Reveals The Tragic Secret Behind Nightcrawler s Origin
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYX-Men Blue: Origins #1 reveals that Nightcrawler is the biological son of Mystique and her wife Destiny, adding tragedy and redemption to his birth story. The retcon changes Nightcrawler’s parentage, removing Azazel as his father and introducing Destiny into his birth story, creating a tale of love, sacrifice, and manipulation. The comic offers a chance for Mystique to repair her strained relationship with her son Kurt, while the relationship between Nightcrawler and Destiny remains uncertain, but the revelation opens up the opportunity for healing and a sense of family among these iconic X-Men characters.

item.title: X-Men Fixed Its Steamy Latex Costumes by Adding 1 Gadget
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYUltimate X-Men’s black latex uniforms blended elements of the comic and movie costumes, and as the first issue of the series revealed, also served a functional purpose: to hide mutants’ X-gene signatures from Sentinels. The inclusion of the X-gene blocker in the uniforms gave them both style and protection, blending the sleek look of the movies with the outlandishness of comic books, while also fulfilling a vital security purpose. The costumes reflect the sensibilities of Marvel’s Ultimate Universe, modernizing and grounding the franchise, while striving to find a balance between X-Men present and past.

item.title: X-Men Is About to Permanently Change Marvel s Timeline With Its Most Significant Death Yet
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYX-Men’s Krakoan Era will come to an end in 2024, potentially changing the entire timeline of the franchise. The cover to Rise of the Powers of X shows someone aiming a gun at Moira MacTaggert, seemingly right before she kicked off the franchise’s 2019 revamp. If Moira dies in that moment, X-Men’s past, present, and future will drastically change. Literature ReviewAs X-Men’s 2019-2024 era approaches its end, a shocking final kill could rewrite Marvel’s past, present, and future - but how is Wolverine involved?

item.title: X-Men Is Assembling Its Darkest Roster Ever, with an Army of Heroes & Villains
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYX-Men are recruiting former enemies as allies in their biggest recruitment drive ever. Gambit believes that the Goblin Queen will stand with them when they need help. X-Men are forming an army with the aid of unlikely allies like Doctor Doom and Maddie Pryor to take down Orchis. Literature ReviewThe X-Men have a habit of turning foe to friend, but their fight against Orchis has pushed them into their strangest recruiting drive ever.

item.title: X-Men Just Officially Replaced a Founding Member, Permanently Rewriting 40 Years of Marvel History
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYOn their mission to kill Beast, X-Force have replaced Hank McCoy with a new version of the hero. Cloned from Hank’s DNA, the new Beast is missing 40 years of memories - including the original’s fall into corruption. The original Beast has gone too far to redeem; now Marvel acknowledges it by replacing him in its ongoing X-Men canon. Literature ReviewAs X-Men permanently kills off a founding member, a new hero is taking their place - one whose existence rewrites four decades of Marvel history.

item.title: X-Men Officially Confirms Mystique s Power Level - & How She Can Become an Omega
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMystique’s powers are revealed to be just short of an Omega-level mutant, and she has the potential to surpass her last limitation and become a god. Mystique is Nightcrawler’s father, not Azazel, and her control over her cellular and genetic structure is instinctive. Mystique’s abilities include rewriting the genomic instructions of every cell in her body, and the only barrier to her true Omega status is her inability to mimic other mutants’ X-Genes.

item.title: X-Men Officially Gives Colossus Credit For Permanently Upgrading Its Mutant Powers
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYColossus’ invention of mutant circuits in 1976’s X-Men #100 has led to monumental advancements in mutant powers. Colossus, who has faced immense personal hardships, finally receives recognition as the creator of mutant technology, elevating him to new prominence. The Krakoan Era has been defined by mutant technology, allowing the X-Men to achieve godlike powers, including resurrection, terraforming, and the ability to conquer entire worlds. Literature ReviewAfter years suffering his personal hell, X-Men finally gives Colossus credit for expanding the limits of mutant powers to include godlike feats.

item.title: X-Men Officially Removes Its Most Powerful Healing Factor from Marvel Canon
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDazzler’s immortality has been a long-standing mystery, but it is finally confirmed that she is not as immortal as she seemed. There is still no explanation for why Dazzler was unable to die in the past, but acknowledging her prior immortality is important for continuity’s sake. Alison losing her immortality removes one of the most powerful healing factors in the X-Men universe, raising the stakes for her in her current mission.

item.title: X-Men Promises Final Reckoning with the Founding Member Who Turned Evil
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe X-Force team, including Wolverine and Colossus, are on the trail of former leader Beast. The ‘Target: Beast’ arc will run from X-Force #48-50, closing out the series’ Krakoan Era run. X-Force #48 will be available from Marvel Comics starting January 24, 2024. Literature ReviewAs X-Men’s 2019-2024 ‘Krakoan Era’ comes to a close, X-Force’s final mission sees them hunt down a founding member with lethal intent. Warning: SPOILERS ahead for X-Force #47!

item.title: X-Men Reveals Final Form of Founding Member Who s Being Permanently Replaced in 2024
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAfter his fall into villainy, the X-Men are planning to kill off the Beast in X-Force #48. X-Force are activating a heroic clone of Beast to kill the original in new teaser art. However, the now villainous Hank McCoy has his own plans, with new armor that upgrades his power level. Literature ReviewAs X-Men officially replaces a founding member, the original has to go, and Wolverine & Colossus have a shocking plan to make it happen.

item.title: X-Men Reveals Powers & Codenames of Doctor Doom s Evil X-Men Roster
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYIn X-Men #29, Doctor Doom unleashes his powerful Legion of Mutants to keep the X-Men out of Latveria, and they prove to be a formidable group with impressive powers. The Legion includes mutants with abilities such as dream entry, invulnerability, super-strength, and electricity powers, making it a difficult task for the X-Men to separate them from Doom’s clutches. Despite their initial hostility, there is potential for an alliance between Doom’s Legion and the X-Men, with some members of the Legion expressing willingness to help and even suggesting that Doom may grant asylum.

item.title: X-Men s 2019-2024 Era Will End by Turning [SPOILER] into a Mutant God - Theory Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe long-teased end of X-Men’s Krakoan era could come as a result of Professor X’s shocking ascension to a god-like status, as a Dominion. Charles Xavier has a lingering psychic trace of Mr. Sinister within him, which may be what leads him down the path to becoming the Dominion. The ascension of Professor X as a Dominion could potentially help save mutantkind in their time of need, rather than dooming them,

item.title: X-Men s Best Friend Duo Reunite For Vengeance in Krakoa s Final Days
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYExciting reunion: Beloved X-Men heroes Shadowkat and Magik team up again after a long time apart. Fans are thrilled to see them together in the mutants’ war against Orchis. Complex friendship: Kate and Illyana’s friendship, marked by moments of intimacy and deep connection, has long been speculated to have romantic undertones. Their collaboration against Orchis offers an emotionally intense setting to explore their feelings. Literature ReviewJoshua Cassara’s cover for X-Men #32 depicts Kate Pryde and Illyana Rasputina fighting Orchis together, finally reuniting X-Men’s most beloved ship.

item.title: X-Men s Corrupted Founding Member Strikes Back - With the Perfect Anti-Healing Factor Weapon
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBeast has developed a powerful anti-healing factor weapon that can incapacitate mutants with healing abilities, as seen when he shoots Omega Red, putting him down indefinitely. Wolverine, who is currently dealing with Sabretooth’s multiversal army, should be wary of Beast’s weapon as it can potentially incapacitate him and turn him into a mindless killer, just as Beast did before with a mind-control device. Beast’s weapon, which mutates its targets into plant-like organisms, was proven effective when Molecule Man turned Wolverine’s son Daken into a tree, and it is a significant danger to Wolverine and the entire X-Force/X-Men team.

item.title: X-Men s Darkest Weapon Yet Was Just Unleashed by Magneto s Daughter Polaris
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPolaris recruits the Brood, a violent alien species, to join the X-Men in their battle against Orchis. Lorna has been missing and in a deep depression since the death of her father Magneto. Polaris’s new costume and mission honor her father’s legacy and could be the key to saving the mutant race from extinction. Literature ReviewPolaris travels to Knowhere in Fall of the House of X #1 to recruit Broo and his legion of Brood, hoping to unleash them on an unsuspecting Orchis.

item.title: X-Men s Deadliest Woman Alive Just Unleashed the Franchise s Most Merciless Attack Yet
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPolaris unleashes a horde of Brood aliens and attacks Orchis, showing that the X-Men are done showing mercy. The X-Men are fighting back against Orchis, the group that has driven them almost to extinction. Polaris uses her powers to prevent Orchis from escaping, leading to a horrifying bloodbath aboard their Bloom base. Literature ReviewAs the X-Men fight their final battle against Orchis, the mutant heroes are done holding back, unleashing a merciless bloodbath.

item.title: X-Men s Emma Frost Is The New Iron Man In Stunning Variant Cover
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEmma Frost gets a sleek silver Iron Man suit in a Dike Ruan variant cover for The Invincible Iron Man #15. Emma Frost receiving her own Iron Man suit aligns with a longstanding tradition of Tony Stark crafting personalized suits for those close to him. Fans eagerly anticipate whether the all-silver Iron Man suit will play a role in the storyline of The Invincible Iron Man #15. Literature ReviewTony Stark, who?

item.title: X-Men s Enemies Aren t Just Hunting Mutants Anymore - They re Hunting Superheroes
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYOrchis is targeting both mutants and non-mutant superheroes, spreading misinformation to continue turning public opinion against mutants, and by extension any heroes that support them. Orchis is falsely accusing non-mutant heroes of being mutants, creating further hysteria, and making it increasingly harder for non-mutants to support mutants. Orchis’ current actions are reminiscent of the “Days of Future Past” story arc, where Sentinels hunted all superpowered people, escalating the problems for Marvel’s heroes at large.

item.title: X-Men s Krakoa Era is Officially Over The Last Mutant Just Left the Island
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe final member of the X-Men has left Krakoa, marking the end of the Krakoa Era. Mister Sinister convinces Professor Xavier to leave the island after discovering Sinister’s presence in his mind. It is unclear why Xavier and Sinister are heading to Muir Island, but it could potentially become a new safe haven for mutants. Literature ReviewX-Men’s Krakoa Era has been steadily heading for a conclusion during the ongoing Fall of X event, and now the final mutant has left the island.

item.title: X-Men s Most Powerful Hero Admits the 1 MCU Avenger Who Can Beat Them
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYIn Original X-Men #1, the Phoenix of Earth-696 brainwashes Tony Stark so that there’s nothing in the way of her conquering the world. Tony Stark’s independent streak and creative genius make him a formidable opponent for the Phoenix, as seen in his Phoenix-Buster armor in Avengers vs. X-Men. The true threat in this story is Onslaught, disguised as the Dark Phoenix, and Jean assembles a team of Wolverines to stop it in the upcoming Weapon X-Men miniseries.

item.title: X-Men s New Weapon M Is Their Most Dangerous Weapon Yet
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAlternate reality Moira wields a powerful new “Weapon M” that allows her to traverse realities and makes her a terrifying villain. The Dead X-Men, resurrected mutants sent on a mission by Rachel Summers and Xavier, must now contend with this evil Moira. Moira’s Weapon M is made from various mutant parts, including Omega Red’s carbonadium coil and adamantium from a Wolverine corpse. She will stop at nothing to ensure her victory.

item.title: X-Men s New Brotherhood Makes Magneto s Original Team Look Pathetic
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYStorm’s victory over Genesis in X-Men Red #18 sets the stage for the creation of a powerful new Brotherhood, led by Genesis and her children War and Famine. Unlike Magneto’s original Brotherhood, Genesis’ team is composed of Omega-level mutants who have trained and fought together for centuries, making them an unstoppable force. Orchis, the current antagonist, is unprepared for the strength and unity of the new Brotherhood, positioning them as the mutants’ last hope in the upcoming battle to save their kind.

item.title: X-Men s New Era Needs to Address The Plot Thread of Marvel s First Ever Mutant
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarvel’s first ever mutant, Tad Carter, debuted in Amazing Adult Fantasy #14, possessing fantastic powers such as flight and telepathy. Tad’s character was forgotten and later brought back in X-Men: The Hidden Years, where he joined a mutant group called the Promise. Tad’s powerful abilities could greatly benefit the X-Men, but his current whereabouts and status remain unknown, leading to speculation that he may be dead. Literature ReviewThe X-Men are entering a new era, one that needs the help of Marvel’s first mutant (it’s not Apocalypse or the Sub-Mariner).

item.title: X-Men s R-Rated New Power Promises an Upcoming Era of Grotesque Body Horror
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPeach Momoko is set to reinvent mutantkind in the new Ultimate X-Men series, with Marvel having previewed the series by sharing a disturbing and bold body-horror take on the character Armor. The preview of Armor’s new design suggests she may have a mind of her own, indicating a potential loss of control in this version of the character. Peach Momoko’s series will revolve around Japanese urban legends coming to life, hinting at a unique and boundary-pushing storyline for the Ultimate X-Men.

item.title: X-Men Top 10 Versions of the Brotherhood of Mutants (Ranked)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Brotherhood of Mutants has consistently evolved and changed to stay relevant in comic book media. Some iterations of the Brotherhood, like the Sunspot-led team, weren’t actually evil or committed any acts of terrorism. Daken’s version of the Brotherhood, with its savage lineup and goal of turning Genesis into the new Apocalypse, is considered the most badass in X-Men lore. Literature ReviewThe Brotherhood of Mutants is a villain team with a long history and a lasting legacy, with countless iterations in X-Men lore.

item.title: Xavier s Replacement Revealed, as Marvel Showcases X-Men s New Status Quo for 2024
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Timeless comic reveals glimpses of the X-Men’s future, suggesting that they may return to the Xavier Institute. Magneto is shown as the potential new leader of the X-Men, wearing his classic helmet and sitting in a large chair, similar to Xavier’s wheelchair. This wouldn’t be the first time Magneto has taken over as leader of the X-Men, as he previously replaced Xavier as headmaster of the Xavier Institute during the Trial of Magneto.

item.title: Yamcha s Fusion With a Surprising Z Fighter Is Dragon Ball s Weirdest Fusion
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYYamcha and Chiaotzu’s fusion in “That Time I Got Reincarnated As Yamcha” is undoubtedly Dragon Ball’s weirdest fusion. The fusion between Yamcha and Chiaotzu was made possible through special rings created by Bulma. Despite their attempt at fusion, Yamcha and Chiaotzu ultimately decide not to battle in their fused form due to their ridiculous appearance. Literature ReviewFans often joke about silly fusions in Dragon Ball Z, but one side manga actually took a goofy fusion pairing and ran with it, to incredible results.

item.title: Yara Flor Cosplay Gives Future Wonder Woman the Live-Action Design She Deserves
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYYara Flor’s Wonder Woman cosplay brings the character’s warrior mentality and unique costume design to life. @zoogirlq is an aspiring zoo veterinarian who specializes in making professional-looking cosplays. Yara Flor’s cosplay deserves recognition as one of the best live-action takes on the character in the nerd community. Literature ReviewYara Flor is one of the newest and most exciting additions to Wonder Woman mythos, with a new DC Comics cosplay giving her a live-action makeover!

item.title: You Are Not Ready” DCs Most Ambitious Batman Story in Years Launches Its Final Act
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBatman returns to a Gotham that doesn’t remember him and must reinvent himself to challenge the powerful Orgham family. The Orgham family employs supernatural beings to control Gotham, making them one of Batman’s most dangerous foes. Batman’s legacy and relationships are reset due to the Orgham family’s influence, requiring him to start over and build a new reputation in Gotham. Literature ReviewFor nearly two years, Batman and Gotham have experienced some major changes in Detective Comics — and now this grand story is reaching its finale.

item.title: You re Simply Not Ready For The Sci-Fi Gore in IF YOU FIND THIS, I M ALREADY DEAD (Exclusive)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYExclusive preview of If You Find This, I’m Already Dead #1 , a multi-dimensional cosmic odyssey by Matt Kindt and Dan McDaid. Follow Robin, a reporter, as she survives and reports on her own in the hostile pocket universe called Terminus. Blending interstellar chaos with a seemingly run-of-the-mill heroine, this series promises thrilling storytelling and exploration of wild ideas. Literature ReviewDark Horse Comics has shared an exclusive preview with Screen Rant for If You Find This, I’m Already Dead #1, which is currently available.

item.title: Young Starfire Arrives in First-Look Preview of DC s New TEEN TITANS Graphic Novel
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYKami Garcia and Gabriel Picolo’s Teen Titans: Starfire, the fifth installment in DC’s bestselling young adult graphic novel series, will be available on July 2, 2024. This installment explores the complexities of family dynamics and the challenges of trust while also delving into the team dynamics of the Teen Titans. Fans can anticipate the highly anticipated moment when the Teen Titans unite for the first time in the series.

item.title: Yuri on Ice Fans Need to Read Shonen Jump s New Sport Series
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTwo on Ice is a new figure skating manga from Shonen Jump that recalls the tones of Yuri on Ice, featuring two skaters who admire each other’s abilities. The manga explores personal hardships that shape a skater’s journey, like Yuri on Ice, but stands out by focusing on pair skating and allowing for individual development. Hayuma and Kisama could be ideal partners, each elevating the other’s skills, but they may face obstacles due to Hayuma’s lack of training and Kisama’s concerns about holding him back.

item.title: Zordon Chose Power Rangers Original Red Ranger Because of Jason s Potential for Evil
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYZordon chose Jason as the Power Rangers’ leader because he saw the error of his ways and has been working to make amends. Jason and Rita Repulsa have similar backgrounds, with Jason transforming from a schoolyard bully and Rita turning evil due to her father’s influence. A true Power Rangers leader recognizes their own flaws and works hard to become a better person, just like Jason did. Literature ReviewThe BOOM!
